solution_line_template: In mid-June, the river is {mid_may_depth}+{deeper_by_june}=<<{mid_may_depth}+{deeper_by_june}={mid_june_depth}>>{mid_june_depth} feet deep.
In mid-July, the river is {mid_june_depth}*{times_deeper_by_july}=<<{mid_june_depth}*{times_deeper_by_july}={mid_july_depth}>>{mid_july_depth} feet deep.
